title: The Bachelorette 2019: Jamie Doran reveals real reason behind cocktail party tears
text:
The Bachelorette's Jamie Doran teared up during the show's first cocktail party on Wednesday after being accused of gossiping to Angie Kent about the other men.

And now, after coming under fire from Noosa politician Jess Glasgow, who confronted Jamie in front of everybody, the hunk has opened up about the spat.

Speaking to TV Week on Wednesday, the 39-year-old elaborated on his outburst, saying: 'It did break me, because everyone was kind of blaming me.'

Emotional! The Bachelorette's Jamie Doran (pictured) teared up during the show's first cocktail party on Wednesday, after being accused of gossiping to Angie Kent by suitor Jess Glasgow

Jamie continued: '[Jess] called me a liar, a snake. And I was like, "Jess, mate, if I do something I'll own it".'

During the episode, Jess physically pushed Jamie while accusing him of spreading rumours to Angie, which prompted him to start crying in the garden.

'I feel like that whole situation with Jess, kind of put me out of the running for the 24 hour rose,' he added on Wednesday.

Reflecting on the drama, Jamie praised co-star Timm Hanly for being 'the only one' to have his back in the mansion and not believe the accusations.

Difficult! Speaking to TV Week on Wednesday, the 39-year-old fireman elaborated on his emotional outburst, saying, 'It did break me, because everyone was kind of blaming me'

Defending himself! Jamie continued, '[Jess] called me a liar, a snake. And I was like, "Jess, mate, if I do something I'll own it"'

Shortly after Jamie's breakdown, it was revealed that Angie's undercover brother Brad had actually been feeding information back to her, not the fireman.

'When people don't trust me, I feel worthless. It's brought out this negative energy that wasn't even in me,' Jamie said on screen after being proven innocent.

'I did nothing wrong. I put a lot of effort into this process, for someone to just come and do that to me and blindside me. I just got blindsided. You know?

Drama! During the episode, Jess (left) physically pushed Jamie while accusing him of spreading rumours to Angie, which prompted the fireman to start crying in the garden

Twist! Shortly after Jamie's breakdown, it was revealed that Angie's (right) undercover brother Brad (left) had actually been feeding information back to her, not Jamie

Jamie added: 'I run into burning buildings for a living, and it doesn't affect me. And then someone tries to manipulate my emotions like that, and... It's just hard.'

The Bachelorette continues on Channel 10 at 7:30pm on Thursday
description: The Bachelorette's Jamie Doran teared up during the show's first cocktail party on Wednesday after being accused of gossiping to Angie Kent about the other men.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
